content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
-  Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
### Errors when a chest at drop position is full
-  Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
### Errors when using extract_item function
-  Make sure the entity from which you are extracting items contains the item you are trying to extract.
